abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn, when you play Shiftry from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may choose 1 of your Evolved Pokémon in play (excluding any Shiftry). Return that Pokémon and all cards attached to it to your hand.

effect.en: If Shiftry has any React Energy cards attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.
